text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
The days go by as we continue our<n>community service
together. Today,<n>we have a special task lined up...

text_block_list.name: Umamusume Child A
text_block_list.text:
Whoa, awesome! I know you! You're<n>really good at
running!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Ohh, you know me? Uhh... Thank you?

text_block_list.name: Umamusume Child B
text_block_list.text:
Wow, your hair is so soft! You're<n>even cuter than you look
on TV!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Huh?! I-I'm cute?!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume Child B
text_block_list.text: Super cute! I looove you!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Er, um... You really shouldn't use that<n>word so lightly... Hey,
Tannhauser!<n>Help me—

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Her tail is so fluffy and soft, right?<n>And just look at those
cute little ears!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: No, don't encourage them! Ugh, why<n>meee?

text_block_list.name: Umamusume Child B
text_block_list.text:
Hey, Nature! Sing something for us!<n>We wanna hear a cute
song!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Sing?! Come on, cut me some slack!

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
All right, everyone! Today, we're<n>going to teach you little
ones a few<n>things about how we big<n>Umamusume run!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume Children
text_block_list.text: Okaaay!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Pant... Wheeze... Nope, I can't doit anymore... Their innocence really hitsyou in the heart in more ways than one...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
We're not even that much older,<n>Nature. You're so
overdramatic.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Oh? Hi there. Why don't you come<n>over here and play with
us?

text_block_list.name: Umamusume Child C
text_block_list.text:
...I know you. At the race before, you<n>caught a cold and
couldn't run!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Huh?!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume Child C
text_block_list.text:
My mommy said you always finish in<n>a good position. But
isn't a "good<n>position" usually first place?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Urgh! Augh... Oof... I tumble.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Yep, there's that pure, unfiltered<n>innocence for you. You're
gonna need<n>a picker-upper after that blow. I'll buy<n>you a
soda on the way back.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
Okay, everyone—this way please!<n>You're getting a real
training session<n>today!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume Children
text_block_list.text: Aye aye, boss!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
How'd she get them so organized?<n>Meanwhile in this
corner...

text_block_list.name: Umamusume Child C
text_block_list.text:
So I was thinking. If you just zoom to<n>the front near the end
of the race,<n>you'll win for sure!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Mhm, I see. Yeah, that's an<n>interesting idea. Thanks for the<n>
advice.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Getting schooled by a little kid...<n>You're just gonna let that
happen,<n>Tannhauser?

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
Hehe. As long as everyone's having<n>fun. Hm? Tannhauser,
those notes in<n>your journal...

text_block_list.name: Umamusume Child C
text_block_list.text:
Also, don't you know you get jinxed<n>if you eat curry before
a race? You<n>won't be able to run your best.

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: Jinxed?! Wait, you have to tellme more! How can I break the jinx?!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Wait, you too now?! Am I the only one<n>thinking straight
today?

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
All right! Looks like all the kids have<n>gone home! Shall we
pack up? ...Oh?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Oh, it's you... Hehe. If you keep<n>hanging on to me like that, I
won't be<n>able to go back to my school.

text_block_list.name: Umamusume Child C
text_block_list.text:
Try not to catch any more colds,<n>okay? I'm rooting for you! I
wanna<n>see you win!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Yup, got it. I'm going to win! It's a<n>promise!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Mu-muuun! BRING IT OOOOON!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Uh... Why the sudden outburst?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I'm gonna do my best! I have to look<n>cool for that kid!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
What's the big rush? I thought you<n>did pretty good in the
welcome race.<n>Better than me, at any rate...

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: What? You two were in the race?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser and Nature
text_block_list.text: Of course we were!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: Oh, Kita... You should know better...

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
I'm really, really sorry! I was just so<n>focused on Teio, I
guess I didn't see<n>anyone else!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
...Sure, I mean... who can blame you?<n>None of us can
compare to a dazzling<n>protagonist like Teio...

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
She makes winning look easy, then<n>goes the extra mile on
top of that. Next<n>to her, we're just your one-off<n>support
characters there to spice up<n>the action.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text: That's not true...

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Nah, I'm serious. Teio's the real deal.<n>No one racks up the
wins like her.

text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
text_block_list.text:
Even so, I want to aim for the top! I'll<n>run with all my might
and get<n>stronger... and become someone<n>people can look
up to!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
You said it, Kita. I'm going to get<n>stronger too—just like
McQueen!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Oh, to be so young and full of<n>aspirations. Wonder if I was
like that<n>when I first enrolled...
